com.gotenna.sdk.firmware

Interface GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener

  • Enclosing class:
    GTFirmwareUpdater

    public static interface GTFirmwareUpdater.GTFirmwareUpdaterListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when firmware updating processes change.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFirmwareWriteProgressUpdated(float firmwareUpdateProgress)
      Called when the firmware is actually being transferred to the goTenna.
      void onFirmwareWritingStateUpdated(GTFirmwareUpdater.FirmwareUpdateState firmwareUpdateState)
      Called when the state of the firmware is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onFirmwareWritingStateUpdated

        void onFirmwareWritingStateUpdated(GTFirmwareUpdater.FirmwareUpdateState firmwareUpdateState)
        Called when the state of the firmware is changed.
        Parameters:
        firmwareUpdateState - The current state of the firmware updating process.

      • onFirmwareWriteProgressUpdated

        void onFirmwareWriteProgressUpdated(float firmwareUpdateProgress)
        Called when the firmware is actually being transferred to the goTenna.
        Parameters:
        firmwareUpdateProgress - How much writing progress has been made a value from 0.0 - 1.0, with 0.5 representing 50% and 1.0 representing 100%
